mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM comments c JOIN tour t ON c.target_no = t.tour_no WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.table_name = 'tour'
SELECT c.* FROM comments c JOIN festival f ON c.target_no = f.festa_no WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.table_name = 'festival'
SELECT c.* FROM comments c JOIN board b ON c.target_no = b.board_no WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.table_name = 'board'
SELECT c.*, u.name, u.nickname FROM comments c JOIN user_tk u ON c.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT tt3.RNUM AS no, tt3.com_no, tt3.user_id, tt3.contents, tt3.target_no, tt3.table_name, TO_CHAR(tt3.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_dt, TO_CHAR(tt3.mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_dt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, tt2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.* FROM comments t1
ORDER BY t1.reg_date DESC ) tt2
WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize}) ) tt3 WHERE RNUM >= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1) ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM comments
) B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( com_no, user_id, contents, target_no, table_name, reg_date, mod_date ) SELECT level AS com_no, 'pcwk' || level AS user_id, '댓글 테스트 내용' || level AS contents, 10 || level AS target_no, DECODE(MOD(level, 3), 0, 'Tour', 1, 'Festival', 2, 'Board') AS table_name, SYSDATE - level AS reg_date, SYSDATE AS mod_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 502

SELECT com_no_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO comments ( com_no, user_id, contents, target_no, table_name, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{comNo}, #{userId}, #{contents}, #{targetNo}, #{tableName}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET contents = #{contents}, mod_date = SYSDATE WHERE com_no = #{comNo}
mapper.select: SELECT com_no, user_id, contents, target_no, table_name, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDt, TO_CHAR(mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS modDt FROM comments WHERE com_no = #{comNo}
SELECT count(*) AS totalCnt FROM comments
